mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(center_code), 0000000) as centerCode FROM CENTER

select C.center_code as "centerCode" , C.center_name as "centerName" , C.center_tel as "centerTel" , C.center_address as "centerAddress" , C.center_guide as "centerGuide" , C.center_opening_date as "centerOpeningDate" , C.center_closing_date as "centerClosingDate" , U.user_code as "userCode" , U.user_name as "userName" FROM center C LEFT OUTER JOIN mapping M ON C.center_code = M.center_code LEFT OUTER JOIN userinfo U ON M.user_code = U.user_code
